intro: I will move my eyes and my mouth in a given order and then you will have to touch my face with the same order

levels.successSentence: Nice, let's try an other sequence!
levels.failureSentence: Too bad, you loose, but it was a nice try

levels.introSentence: Let's do something a bit harder
levels.failureSentence: Too bad, you failed. You will do better next time!

levels.successSentence: Well done! You got everything right, you are really good
levels.failureSentence: You loose but you did a good job!

levels.introSentence: Last level, give it all you got
levels.successSentence: Perfect! You are truly a champion!
levels.failureSentence: Too bad, you loose. But you were very close!
